item.title: B&B Dieweg
item.body: Enjoy the calm and tranquillity of a beautiful district in the south of Brussels. In a very pleasant environment, a charming multilingual lady, whose passions include travel, gardening and museums, will open the doors of her house to you. A welcome in French, Dutch, English German or Spanish.Twin room with washbasin "Bambou" - shared bathroom - 15 minutes from the city centre by car - stay from 2 to 30 days. Location : Dieweg - Brussels 1180 Access : Bus : 60 Tram 92- 97 close by.

item.title: B&B Woluwé
item.body: In a house which has been laid out with impeccable taste. Lots of greenery, and very warm welcome.Twin bed in the mezzanine (second floor) - private bathroom and WC - possibility of a second room for 2 persons - TV - WIFI - 15 minutes by underground from the city centre - no animals (1 dog in the house) - no smoker - stay : from 1 to 30 days. Location : rue de la Station de Woluwé - 1200 Bruxelles Access : Subway station Roodebeek Bus 42 Tram 39-44 (Montgomery)
item.address: rue de la station de Woluwé

item.title: B&B Copernic
item.body: Guest room close by the weather Observatory of Brussels, you are welcome in a very nice house by a lovely couple in either French, Dutch, English or Italian. The area is calm and green, but close from numerous restaurants. The train station " Saint Job " is not far and the car parking easy.Twins bedroom ( 2nd floor) - Bathroom to share with the family - no smoking - no pets - possible access to a TV (other room) - stay from 1 to 30 nights. Location : Rue Copernic 1180 Brussels Access : Tram : 92 Bus : 60 (quartier Européén) 134 (Gare du Midi) Train : St-Job (line 26)

item.title: B&B Broustin
item.body: This housing is located at a stone's throw of the 'Basilique de Koekelberg' in the north of Brussels. A music-loving landlord will welcome you in his large flat on the 2nd floor of a traditional Brussels House. You are at a 5-minute metro ride from the city centre. Stays from 1 to 30 nights.Double room (2de floor) - shared bathroom - non smoking - no pets - private entrance - free parking in the neighbourhood. Location : Av Broustin 1090 Bruxelles Access : Métro Elisabeth / Simonis (a 5-minute walk) Line 2 or 6 (5 minutes walking distance)Tram 19 Bus 87 - ring Brussels (10 min.) -

item.title: B&B Auderghem
B&B Markelbach
B&B Gisseleire Versé
item.body: <object width="400" height="321"> <param value="http://www.youtube.com/v/Pn1Oy-Dq7sA?fs=1&hl=fr_FR" name="movie" /> <param value="true" name="allowFullScreen" /> <param value="always" name="allowscriptaccess" /><embed width="400" height="321" allowfullscreen="true" allowscriptaccess="always" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/Pn1Oy-Dq7sA?fs=1&hl=fr_FR"></embed></object>

item.title: B&B Etangs d'Ixelles
item.body: The room is very well located in the area of the Ixelles ponds, Flagey place and La Cambre Abbey (Louise Ave). The landlady owning this Brussels house welcomes you either in French, Dutch or English. The area is within easy access from public transport and the city centre is 10 minutes away. In the neighbourhood: lots of restaurants and shops, local market every Saturday, Ixelles museum, etc.Double bed or twin bed (1st floor) - private bathroom - possibility of a second room for 2 - terrace - no smoking - no pets - stays from 2 to 30 nights Situation : Chaussée de Vleurgat - 1000 Bruxelles Accès : Tram 23-25-93-94 Bus 38 (quartier européen)

item.title: B&B Barrière St Gilles
item.body: The entire family of this house will make you feel instantly at home. Located in a neighbourhood which is very close to the city centre, and at the heart of the Art Nouveau area.Double room and private bathroom (2nd floor) - no pets - stay from 1 day to 30 days - no smokers. Situation : chaussée d'Alsemberg - 1060 Bruxelles Metro Horta - Trams 3 - 4 - 33 -51

item.title: B&B BIhOme
item.body: Close to the majestic town hall of Schaarbeek, the owner of a mansion dating from 1902 offers a room designed to reduce the risks of allergy. Nearby: Les Halles de Schaerbeek, Le Botanique, the Autrique house and many other Art Nouveau buildings. Many restaurants and snack bars. Possibility of breakfast for specific allergies to lactose, gluten and BIO. With nice weather, the breakfast can be served in the garden, along with the rabbit. Twin Room (3rd Floor / stairs) private shower room and toilet - baby chair - no smoking - no pets - stay of 1 to 30 nights (no kitchen).Situation : av Maréchal Foch 1030 BruxellesAccess : tram : 7-55-92 Bus 58-59-65-66 Métro Botanique à 15 minutes à pied

item.title: B&B Grand Place
item.body: In the very heart of the city centre, a few steps away from the Grand Place, enjoy your stay in a house decorated in an original way by your hosts. French, English, Dutch and even a few words of Italian and Spanish are spoken. Various activities in the immediate surroundings: historic centre, museums, cinemas, shops, bars and restaurants, cybercafé Stay from 1 night to 3 nights.Double room (3 rd floor) - ensuite shower and toilet - NON smoking - no pets allowed - paying car park at 150 metres.The owner reserves the right to assign the preferred room Location: rue Marché au Charbon - 1000 Brussels Access : metro station Anneessens- tram 52-55-56-81 bus 3

item.title: B&B de Laubespin
item.body: Lodging located in an open area north of Brussels (15 minutes by car to the city centre). The owners accommodate you in their house in French, Dutch, English, Italian or Spanish. At proximity: Exhibitions Park of Heyzel/Atomium (3 minutes by foot).One double bedroom (+/- 50 m2) - 1 sleeping couch + possibility of an extra bed for one person - private shower-room and WC microwave oven - no smoking - no animals - stay from 3 to 20 nights.Situation : rue de l' Aubespin 1020 BruxellesAccess : métro Stuyvenbergh

item.title: Gîte-auberge J.Brel
item.body:
At the Brel, do whatever you feel like. It’s up to you: Whether you want to sleep or party, sample Belgian beer and chips or head straight for fast food, check out what the Manneken-pis is like in real life or go on a walking/sightseeing tour. You can laze around in the sofa or... it’s none of our business! At the J.Brel Youth Hostel, you call the shots!
 
 
 
 Bed inventory: 171 beds
 Room inventory:
 51 rooms from 2 to 6 beds
 Private bathrooms & shared
 bathrooms
 (shower in every room)

item.title: Vincent Van Gogh (CHAB)
item.body:
Fancy meeting interesting people and sharing all sorts of experiences? Artists, hitchhikers and work experience students from all over the world can feel free and express themselves at the Vincent Van Gogh-Chab, in central Brussels! In the heart of the Capital of Europe, in a neighbourhood that is home to several film production companies, there’s no better place to awaken or revive your artistic spirit. And for culture lovers, the Botanical Gardens are a stone’s throw away!
 
 
 Bed inventory: 210 beds
 Room inventory: 52 rooms
 from 1 to 10 beds
 Private & shared bathrooms

item.title: Sonian Wood Bed&Breakfast
item.body:
Sonian Wood Bed and Breakfast is named after the Zoniën Woud/Forêt de Soignes – the forest that surrounds the southeast edge of Brussels.
 
Our home, nestled in a friendly village neighbourhood, is about thirty minutes by public transportation to the centre of Brussels and a three minute walk to the Sonian Forest - vast and beautiful for strolling, biking, jogging....
 
Within walking distance are many shops, restaurants of diverse cuisines and a flourishing outdoor market on Sundays.

item.title: Hotel Be Manos
item.body: The Be Manos Hotel, ideally located next to the Thalys and Eurostar Terminal, is the first Design Boutique Luxury Hotel in Brussels. The Hotel, with its 60 Rooms and Junior Suites decorated in Black and White with natural black stone floors, metallic curtains, joyful photographs laid in aluminum, terraces with a panoramic view and gastronomicRestaurant Be Lella are a mixture of esthetics, luxury and a timeless design.

item.title: First Euroflat Hotel
item.body: In the heart of the European District ! Located in the European Commission district and only at 100m from the Schuman station (metro, bus, trains, airport shuttles), the First Euroflat Hotel welcomes you in the international environment of the European Village. In the classic comfort of its 133 bedrooms, the hotel atmosphere is warm and friendly. The bright and spacious rooms, the generous breakfast and the privileged location of the hotel will place your business trips under the sign of detente. FREE WIFI Hotel

item.title: Hotel Manos Premier
item.body: Discover The Manos Premier,a long standing Brussels establishement with luxurious guestrooms and suites,function rooms, spa, fine dining restaurant and one of the top location in Brussels This Brussels 5 star hotel has enchanted its guest for over 30 years impressing discerning travellers with a selection of 5 star accommodation options: including grand apartment suites, luxurious one bedroom suites, stylish rooms. Our gourmet restaurant provides the finest cuisine and wines in an elegant dining environment As a guest, you too will be delighted by this charming classic boutique hotel and the many pleasures it provides. Our service is second to none, and our staff and concierge team ensure your every need is met. All to ensure you receive one of the best hospitality experiences in Brussels. Our location is just off fashionable Avenue Louise and in walking distance from the city center.

item.title: Brussels Marriott Hotel
item.body:
Located in the heart of historic Brussels, opposite the Bourse, the Brussels Marriott Hotel is the ideal place to experience the charm of this historic city. Positioned within a restored 19th Century building, the hotel is surrounded by exclusive young and trendy designer boutiques in Rue Antoine Dansaert, and within walking distance of most of Brussels' renowned tourist attractions including the Grand Place.
Set where an island once stood in a flowing river, this smoke-free grand city center hotel offers luxurious accommodation. Well-appointed 221 guest rooms maximise breathtaking views of downtown Brussels. Room amenities include plush bedding, a spacious work area with wireless internet access, air conditioning, cable/satellite TVs, mini-bar and in-room safe. Rooms on the Executive level enjoy complimentary internet access and have unlimited entry to the Executive Lounge, where complimentary snacks and beverages are served throughout the day.
When an occasion calls for an exceptional setting 611 m² of function space is among the finest in Brussels, with an expert event staff to handle your every need. Whether you are planning a company strategy session, an intimate cocktail party or a celebratory banquet, you always have our undivided attention and tailor-made approach.
Dining at the Midtown Bar & Grill offers a culinary journey that it not soon forgotten. Known as being one of the premier steakhouses in Brussels, the restaurant serves U.S. prime beef steaks with seasonal dishes using fresh, local Belgium ingredients. This trendy restaurant offers a fun, vibrant environment.
The Brussels Marriott Hotel is located on the renowned Rue Auguste and is ideal for a stay in the city, exploring, discovering and savouring the best Belgium has to offer.
